Class Border

This class represents an immutable border object contains width, style and color.

Hierarchy

  • Border

Implements

  • IAnimatable<Border>

Constructors

constructor

  • new Border(width: number, style: BorderStyle, color: Color): Border
    • Defined in style/Border.ts:64

    Constructs and initializes a border object with given arguments of sRGB and alpha.

    Parameters

    • width: number

      the width of the four borders.

    • style: BorderStyle

      what kind of border to display.

    • color: Color

      the color of this border.

    Returns Border

Properties

color

color: Color = Color.NONE
  • Defined in style/Border.ts:64

Specifies the color of this border.

style

style: BorderStyle = BorderStyle.SOLID
  • Defined in style/Border.ts:60

Specifies what kind of border to display. Currently only support solid color.

width

width: number = 0
  • Defined in style/Border.ts:55

Specifies the width of the four borders.

Static DEFAULT

DEFAULT: Border = new Border(0, BorderStyle.SOLID, Color.BLACK)
  • Defined in style/Border.ts:26

Default border object with 0 border size.

equals

  • equals(that: Border): boolean
    • Defined in style/Border.ts:92

    Checks whether two BaseValue Border are equal. The result is true if and only if the argument is a Border object that has the same width, style and color as this Rect.

    Parameters

    • that: Border

      the Object to compare with this Border object.

    Returns boolean

    true if the objects are equal; false otherwise.

Static of

  • of(value: string, silent?: boolean): Border | undefined
    • Defined in style/Border.ts:34

    Convert a string to a Border object.

    Parameters

    • value: string

      a string present border, the format is [width] [style] [color]

    • Default value silent: boolean = false

    Returns Border | undefined

    A border object for valid value, otherwise returns undefined.
